content.question: ​The rational function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator open parentheses x squared plus 3 x close parentheses open parentheses x squared minus 4 x minus 5 close parentheses over denominator open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses open parentheses x minus 1 close parentheses open parentheses x minus 2 close parentheses end fraction"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfrac></math>. For what input values of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> are the output values of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> equal to <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
